content: Loved this but no longer watch it after show being cancelled now yes I know it's on Netflix But when you have watched every episode 6 times over it gets boring. Overall I give It 2.5 stars Good luck
replyContent: Thank you for your feedback Wyatt, we appreciate it!

content: Disappointing. The free BBC apps are generally quite good, but this one is really poorly made and there isn't much to it. You progress and get a star whether you get the answers right or not so my kids just tap the first thing they see to get to the next clip. It took my 5 year about 45 mins to get through most of the game getting most answers correct. It took my toddler about 2 mins to get through two levels of the matching game without getting a single answer correct. Both bored with it now.
replyContent: Hello Tom, thank you for your feedback. We are sorry to hear that you children did not enjoy the game. If they found it too easy, may we suggest repeat playing, as it is an excellent way of strengthening the learning they have completed within the app. Thank you again!
Thank you for your review. Would you consider giving us 5 stars, as you enjoyed the game If not, please let us know how we can improve it. Thank you!
Thank you for your great review!

content: 4 year completed the whole game in less than 3 30min sittings and theres no more levels! definitely not worth the money it was fun some free apps offer more levels
replyContent: Thank you very much for your review concerning our game. We are always collecting user feedback and emails that we can apply with updates.

content: Child loves game! But still a white screen! FIX YOUR GAME!!!!!! Not worth downloading! Just disappoint your kids. And it cost $$ SMDH
replyContent: Hello Summer, thanks for your review. We have now fixed this problem. Please update to version 01.00.15 or greater. If you are still having problems, please RESTART YOUR DEVICE and then RE-OPEN the app. Everything should be working correctly now. Thanks!

content: When I download this app it can't download
replyContent: Hello G Fletcher, thank you for your review. To try and resolve this, firstly make sure that you are downloading the latest version of the app from the play store, and that your device has enough remaining storage for the app. If you still cannot download the app, please contact our support team, at support@alphablocks.tv for assistance. Thank you!

Hi, we've fixed this problem. Please update to version 01.00.15 or greater. 

If you are still having problems, please RESTART YOUR DEVICE and then RE-OPEN the app. Everything should be working correctly now.
 
Thanks!

content: Love the concept and my child is activity engaged. However, the last question in each 'level', the card on the left of the subtraction doesn't show so we have to guess the answer.
replyContent: Hi, thanks for your review and feedback, I'm glad your child is enjoying it :) Also, we have fixed this issue you mentioned and it is now available in the Version 01.00.03 onwards. Thanks!
